general.admin_email_description: This is the administrators email. Please be aware that changing the email will log you out.
general.admin_password_description: This is the administrators password. You can change it to anything you like at any time.
general.confirm_password_error1: * Confirm password password cannot be empty
general.confirm_password_error2: * Does not match with new password
general.appointment_message_description:
This message is displayed at the last step of the booking process. It appears when an appointment is successfully completed. 
You can change it at any time.

If you want to style the text you can put it in between '#'.
The text automatically will be converted to upper case.

Example:
#THANK YOU,
FOR CHOOSING US!#
EXPECT CONFIRMATION BY EMAIL
general.social_media_description: Set up URLs of the barbershop's social media pages. You can change it at any time.
general.contact_info_description: Provide contact details to the public. You can change it at any time.
general.working_time_description:
You can define the working time of the barbershop. It is displayed in the tab Contacts.

If you want to style the text you can put it in between '#'.
The text automatically will be converted to upper case.

Example:
#TUESDAY TO SUNDAY:#
09:00 - 18:00 часа
#MONDAY:#
 not working.

emails.description_booking_email:
You can specify the text of the email message that the system sends when creating a reservation. Symbol that represents new line :
In order to have text formatted bold or italic surround the text like: bold text italic text Also in the email you can define barber's name, service's type and the date/time of the appointment using the following key-words: 1.$barber 2.$service 3.$appointment
emails.description_forgot_password_email:
You can specify the text of the email message that the system sends when password is forgotten. Symbol that represents new line :
You can use special word $password to represent the actual password in the email.
emails.subject: Subject

booking.phone_error: Please enter a valid phone number
